Package it.polimi.ingsw.View.GUI.SceneController

Class PlayerNumSceneController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.View.GUI.SceneController.GuiController
it.polimi.ingsw.View.GUI.SceneController.PlayerNumSceneController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class PlayerNumSceneController extends GuiController implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class is responsible for controlling the player number selection scene in the GUI.

    • onContinueButtonClick

      protected void onContinueButtonClick()
      Handles the "Continue" button click event. Sends a NewGameMTS command to the server with the selected number of players.

    • onBackToMenuButtonClick

      protected void onBackToMenuButtonClick()
      Handles the "Back to Menu" button click event. Changes the scene back to the login scene.

      Returns:
      the selected number of players
